VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Ironwood Ranch relative to Misty Meadow Acres?
SRP.A: Ironwood Ranch is {above} Misty Meadow Acres in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total livestock production?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Misty Meadow Acres}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total livestock production?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Ironwood Ranch}.

VE.A: Misty Meadow Acres's livestock production in 1985 is {49941.72} tons.

EVJ.A: The global minimum livestock production is {49941.72} tons.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Livestock Production in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum livestock production is {64719.93} tons.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Livestock Production level recorded for Ironwood Ranch?
EVJ.A: Ironwood Ranch reached approximately {57866.65} tons in {1988}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Livestock Production level recorded for Ironwood Ranch?

SC.Q: What is the average total Livestock Production?
SC.A: The average total livestock production is {111355.26} tons.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Livestock Production exceed 116474.12 tons? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1985 and 1987, did the total Livestock Production experience a larger or smaller change than between 1985 and 1986?
NC.A: The change in total livestock production between 1985 and 1987 was {larger} than between 1985 and 1986.

NC.Q: Between 1986 and 1987, was the average total Livestock Production higher or lower than between 1986 and 1988?
NC.A: The average total livestock production between 1986 and 1987 was {lower} than between 1986 and 1988.

NC.Q: Was the total Livestock Production in 1985 higher or lower than in 1988?
NC.A: The total livestock production in 1985 was {lower} than in 1988.

NC.Q: Between 1987 and 1988, was the average total Livestock Production higher or lower than between 1986 and 1987?
NC.A: The average total livestock production between 1987 and 1988 was {higher} than between 1986 and 1987.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Misty Meadow Acres} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Ironwood Ranch, Misty Meadow Acres}.
